NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Disposable non-chemical medical consumables and haematological consumables

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B03

TI_TEXT.P: Appareils et instruments de chirurgie cardiaque

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority wishes to enter into framework agreements for the delivery of consumables for cardiac surgery.
— Perfusion equipment for open cardiac surgery,
— Surgical equipment with various catheters, adapters, etc.
For a more detailed description, see Appendix 2, Requirement specifications and list of products.
